docs.lead_paragraph: AMONG the numerous writers of fairy tales for grown people there are few who can weave more charm into their narratives than does Jeffery Farnol. Very often one feels that the rose-colorod spectacles such writers wear are merely assumed for the occasion, and kept in place only by a good deal of effort; their rosy view as one determinedly assumed, and at a very considerable cost.

headline.main: Latest Works of Fiction; SIR JOHN DERING. By Jeffery Farnol, Boston: Little, Brown & Co. $2.
